string.value: As soon as you reach Level 37, #b#p1002104##k sends you a message. Is there a new lead?

#p1002104# says that he's found hidden traces of the #o9300346# and that the puppeteer is hidden in a #bsmall cabin#k somewhere in #b#m105040200##k. He says you have the greenlight to finish off the #o9300346# if you run into him again.


#o9300346##r #a217341##k
You defeated the #o9300346# without a definite clue to lead you to the #t4032323#. But then, #p1002104# flashed a comforting smile as if to tell you not to worry about a thingâ€¦
Are you busy? I have been looking all over Victoria Island in search of valuable information and found something that might intrigue you. It's about #o9300346#...
I don't know if you know this, but ever since you taught #o9300346# a lesson, the entrance to the Evil Eye Cave doesn't work. It looks like #o9300346# has moved to a new hideout.

I received a report that someone witnessed #o9300346# entering a #bsmall cabin#k in #b#m105040200##k of #m105040300#. I heard it from a reliable source, so it's probably true. Rush over and defeat #r#o9300346##k.
Come back after defeating #o9300346#. I have some good news I want to share when you come back. Haha, you won't be disappointed.
Hm? Hey, what are you saying? It's certified information provided to you by the finest source on this continent! You can trust me on this.
You must have come back after defeating #o9300346#... But what's with the long face? Did something happen?#b#L0#(You explain there wasn't any information on #t4032323#.)#l\n#k
Ah, that's what's bothering you. Hahaha, you don't have to worry about that.
Hey, you still haven't gone to fight #r#o9300346##k? The new hideout for #o9300346# is a #bsmall cabin#k located in #b#m105040200##k. You should eliminate him once and for all!
